title: Can't invoke HTTPS service from OSB
description:
We Can't able to invoke SOLR HTTPS from OSB But the same SOLR working fine in http.

We can able to access the SOLR using https in broswer 
but while invoking OSB service we are facing below issue.

General runtime error: unrecognized response from proxy: 'HTTP/1.1 502 Proxy Error ( The ISA Server denied the specified Uniform Resource Locator (URL). )'

Could you please help here to resolve this issue.

comments.author: Erick Erickson
comments.content: Please raise this issue on the user's list rather than raise a JIRA. If the consensus is that it's really a bug/enhancement in Solr we can re-open this issue.
